unnormalised: Crop insurance is crucial, bhai! Especially with unpredictable monsoons these days.
normalised: Crop insurance is crucial, brother! Especially with unpredictable monsoons these days.

unnormalised: Heard good things about Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana.

unnormalised: Farmers in Punjab and Haryana are benefitting, I think.

unnormalised: Is it worth the hassle though? Getting claims sanctioned can take forever.
normalised: Is it worth the hassle though? Getting claims sanctioned can take forever.

unnormalised: My uncle Ramesh had a terrible experience last year after the floods on 26/07/2023.
normalised: My uncle Ramesh had a terrible experience last year after the floods on twenty sixth july two thousand and twenty three.
